Begin Again

June 14, 2023 • Jack

The storm passes

Black clouds clear

Damage done

Pick up broken pieces

Feel the sun

Begin again

Try to create

Efforts fail

Hard to accept

Ashamed and embarrassed

Not sure what’s next

Begin again

Socially outcast

Feeling alone

Emotions flood

Look deep within

Find the good

Begin again

Head spins

Thoughts muddled

Samsara unleashed

Calm the mind

Feel at peace

Begin again

A union dissolves

Hearts break

Life in tatters

Find the meaning

Seek what’s after

Begin again
